name: Dark Age of Camelot: Shrouded Isles
name_original: Dark Age of Camelot: Shrouded Isles
description:
Dark Age of Camelot: Shrouded Isles is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Mythic Entertainment. It came out on 03-12-2002. It was published by Vivendi Universal Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Dark Age of Camelot: Shrouded Isles on PC.
